document_data.name: Boroland Nevilard
document_data.mainbody: '''Boroland Nevilard''' was a wandering bard of the late mid-13{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Boroland Nevilard passed through [[Innarlith]] once a season on the way between the [[Border Kingdoms]] and the [[Vilhon Reach]], never spending more than a few days at a time, but spending them with [[Talatha Vaerovree]], a local sorceress.
document_data.Relationships: He was a fling of Talatha Vaerovree's in the late 14{{th}} century DR.
document_data.History: His visits to Talatha began when he mistook her home for an abandoned ruin, and caught sight of her bathing in a rainwater basin. She approached him then.{{cite book/Secrets of the Magister|90}}
document_data.Rumors & Legends: [[Talatha Vaerovree]] suspected him of being a spy and information broker for wizards in the Vilhon.
